description: Sharing a bathroom with your step-brother can certainly be a drag, but it's all about perspective. One man's over-crowded situation is another's excuse to get unnaturally close, and Donte Thick is definitely of the second persuasion. Step-brother Will Braun is hesitant at first, but his hard on is undeniable, so when Donte offers to help him out with it, Will is reluctant but motivated to give it a try. Lucky for him he does, because he discovers that keeping it in the family is its own reward, and after today, Will won't mind sharing the shower quite so much.Enjoy!
title: Shower For Two
